words.example: The abrupt change in weather caught everyone off guard.
words.chineseOfExample: 天气的突然变化让所有人都措手不及。

words.example: Scientists first conceived the idea of the atomic bomb in the 1930s.
words.chineseOfExample: 科学家们在20世纪30年代首次构思出原子弹的想法。

words.example: We must constantly endeavor to improve our work.
words.chineseOfExample: 我们必须不断努力改进我们的工作。

words.example: The fragile glassware needs to be packed carefully.
words.chineseOfExample: 易碎的玻璃器皿需要小心包装。

words.example: Don't hesitate to ask for help if you need it.
words.chineseOfExample: 如果你需要帮助，不要犹豫开口。

phrases.example: Can you account for your absence last Friday?
phrases.chineseOfExample: 你能解释一下上周五你为什么缺席吗？

phrases.example: The old car broke down on the way to the beach.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 那辆旧车在去海滩的路上抛锚了。

phrases.example: I need some time to figure out the problem.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 我需要一些时间来解决这个问题。

phrases.example: The new policy may give rise to some unexpected problems.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 新政策可能会引发一些意想不到的问题。

phrases.example: It's hard to keep up with the latest technology.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 很难跟上最新的技术发展。

words.example: Let me acquaint you with the new regulations.
words.chineseOfExample: 让我来给你介绍一下新规定。

words.example: We decided to bypass the city center to avoid traffic.
words.chineseOfExample: 我们决定绕过市中心以避开交通拥堵。

words.example: All employees must comply with the safety regulations.
words.chineseOfExample: 所有员工都必须遵守安全规定。

words.example: She found herself in a dilemma when choosing between two job offers.
words.chineseOfExample: 在两份工作机会之间做选择时，她陷入了两难境地。

words.example: The old photo evoked memories of his childhood.
words.chineseOfExample: 这张旧照片唤起了对他的童年的回忆。

words.example: The committee is trying to formulate a new policy.
words.chineseOfExample: 委员会正在努力制定一项新政策。

words.example: She expressed her gratitude to the rescue team.
words.chineseOfExample: 她向救援队表达了感激之情。

words.example: Without hesitation, he jumped into the river to save the child.
words.chineseOfExample: 他毫不犹豫地跳进河里去救那个孩子。

words.example: The new employees are quickly integrating into the company culture.
words.chineseOfExample: 新员工正在迅速融入公司文化。

words.example: His carelessness could jeopardize the entire project.
words.chineseOfExample: 他的粗心大意可能会危及整个项目。

phrases.example: It takes time to adapt to a new environment.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 适应新环境需要时间。

phrases.example: Thieves broke into the house last night.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 昨晚有小偷闯入了这所房子。

phrases.example: I came across an old friend in the street yesterday.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 我昨天在街上偶然遇到了一位老朋友。

phrases.example: He decided to drop out of college to start his own business.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 他决定从大学辍学去创业。

phrases.example: We figured on having a picnic this weekend.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 我们打算这个周末去野餐。

words.example: The strong kinship between the siblings was evident.
words.chineseOfExample: 兄弟姐妹之间的亲密关系显而易见。

words.example: He has a legitimate reason for being late.
words.chineseOfExample: 他迟到有正当的理由。

words.example: The artist was meticulous in his work.
words.chineseOfExample: 这位艺术家工作一丝不苟。

words.chineseMeaning: 臭名昭著的；声名狼藉的
words.example: The city is notorious for its high crime rate.
words.chineseOfExample: 这座城市因犯罪率高而臭名昭著。

words.example: This type of technology has become obsolete.
words.chineseOfExample: 这种技术已经过时了。

words.example: Lack of time may preclude us from finishing the project.
words.chineseOfExample: 时间不足可能会妨碍我们完成这个项目。

words.example: It's difficult to quantify the impact of this decision.
words.chineseOfExample: 很难量化这个决定的影响。

words.example: They finally reconciled their differences.
words.chineseOfExample: 他们最终调和了分歧。

words.example: The market is saturated with similar products.
words.chineseOfExample: 市场上充斥着类似的产品。

words.example: Don't waste your time on trivial matters.
words.chineseOfExample: 不要把时间浪费在琐碎的事情上。

phrases.example: She gets along well with her colleagues.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 他和同事们相处得很好。

phrases.example: The construction work is holding up traffic.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 施工工作阻碍了交通。

phrases.example: I'm looking forward to your reply.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 我期待着你的回复。

phrases.example: Don't put off until tomorrow what you can do today.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 今日事今日毕。

phrases.example: The new manager will take over next week.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 新经理下周将接管工作。

words.example: Our ultimate goal is to improve people's living standards.
words.chineseOfExample: 我们的最终目标是提高人们的生活水平。

words.example: He is a versatile actor who can play various roles.
words.chineseOfExample: 他是一位多才多艺的演员，能扮演各种角色。

words.example: The evidence does not warrant such a conclusion.
words.chineseOfExample: 这些证据不足以得出这样的结论。

words.example: Xenophobia is a serious social problem in some countries.
words.chineseOfExample: 仇外心理在一些国家是一个严重的社会问题。

words.example: She yelled for help when she saw the fire.
words.chineseOfExample: 她看到火灾时大声呼救。

words.example: His zeal for the project is inspiring.
words.chineseOfExample: 他对这个项目的热情很鼓舞人心。

words.example: The doctor said his blood pressure was abnormal.
words.chineseOfExample: 医生说他的血压不正常。

words.example: The old man is very benevolent and often helps the poor.
words.chineseOfExample: 这位老人非常仁慈，经常帮助穷人。

words.example: Education is compulsory for children in most countries.
words.chineseOfExample: 在大多数国家，儿童接受教育是义务性的。

words.example: She is a diligent student who always gets good grades.
words.chineseOfExample: 她是一个勤奋的学生，总是取得好成绩。

phrases.example: I will back you up in this matter.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 在这件事上我会支持你。

phrases.example: Can you come up with a better solution?
phrases.chineseOfExample: 你能想出一个更好的解决方案吗？

phrases.example: The temperature will drop off tonight.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 今晚气温会下降。

phrases.example: I need some time to figure out this problem.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 我需要一些时间来解决这个问题。

phrases.example: Don't give in to pressure easily.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 不要轻易向压力屈服。

words.example: The adverse weather conditions affected the crop yield.
words.chineseOfExample: 不利的天气条件影响了农作物的产量。

words.example: He made a blunder by forgetting the important meeting.
words.chineseOfExample: 他犯了个大错，忘记了重要会议。

words.example: A quiet environment is conducive to study.
words.chineseOfExample: 安静的环境有助于学习。

words.example: His explanation seems dubious.
words.chineseOfExample: 他的解释似乎可疑。

words.example: She wore an exquisite diamond necklace.
words.chineseOfExample: 她戴了一条精美的钻石项链。

words.example: The company was involved in a fraud scandal.
words.chineseOfExample: 该公司卷入了一起欺诈丑闻。

words.example: The new shopping mall is gigantic.
words.chineseOfExample: 新的购物中心非常庞大。

words.example: Lack of funds may hinder the project's progress.
words.chineseOfExample: 资金不足可能会阻碍项目的进展。

words.example: He immersed himself in his studies.
words.chineseOfExample: 他全身心投入到学习中。

words.example: Juvenile crime is a serious social problem.
words.chineseOfExample: 青少年犯罪是一个严重的社会问题。

phrases.example: The new policy brought about many changes.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 新政策带来了许多变化。

phrases.example: The football match was called off due to bad weather.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 由于天气恶劣，足球比赛被取消了。

phrases.example: We should cut down on our expenses.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 我们应该削减开支。

phrases.example: It took her a long time to get over the breakup.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 她花了很长时间才从分手中走出来。

phrases.example: The police will look into the case.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 警方将调查这个案件。

words.example: She is keen on learning new languages.
words.chineseOfExample: 她渴望学习新语言。

words.example: The business turned out to be very lucrative.
words.chineseOfExample: 这项生意结果非常赚钱。

words.example: The scientist was meticulous in his experiments.
words.chineseOfExample: 这位科学家做实验一丝不苟。

words.chineseMeaning: 臭名昭著的；声名狼藉的
words.example: The criminal is notorious for his violent crimes.
words.chineseOfExample: 这个罪犯因暴力犯罪而臭名昭著。

words.example: The law obliges parents to send their children to school.
words.chineseOfExample: 法律责成父母送孩子上学。

words.example: He is persistent in his pursuit of success.
words.chineseOfExample: 他坚持不懈地追求成功。

words.example: A cold drink quenched his thirst.
words.chineseOfExample: 一杯冷饮解了他的渴。

words.example: The two sisters resemble each other very much.
words.chineseOfExample: 两姐妹长得非常相像。

words.example: The new technology is very sophisticated.
words.chineseOfExample: 这项新技术非常复杂。

words.example: The delicious smell tempted him to eat more.
words.chineseOfExample: 那诱人的香味诱使他多吃了一些。

phrases.example: Don't give up easily, you can make it.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 别轻易放弃，你能成功的。

phrases.example: Let's go over the lessons before the exam.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 考试前咱们复习一下功课吧。

phrases.example: Hold on a minute, I'm coming.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 等一下，我就来。

phrases.example: Keep on trying, and you will succeed.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 继续努力，你会成功的。

phrases.example: She looks after her elderly parents.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 她照顾年迈的父母。

words.example: The committee was unanimous in its decision.
words.chineseOfExample: 委员会在决策上达成了一致意见。

words.example: The city center is a vibrant place.
words.chineseOfExample: 市中心是个充满活力的地方。

words.example: He is wary of strangers.
words.chineseOfExample: 他对陌生人很警惕。

words.example: The child played a beautiful tune on the xylophone.
words.chineseOfExample: 孩子在木琴上演奏了一首美妙的曲子。

words.example: They went on a luxury yacht for a vacation.
words.chineseOfExample: 他们乘坐豪华游艇去度假。

words.example: The zealous fans cheered for their team.
words.chineseOfExample: 热情的球迷们为他们的球队欢呼。

words.example: Everyone must abide by the rules.
words.chineseOfExample: 每个人都必须遵守规则。

words.example: The city was besieged by the enemy.
words.chineseOfExample: 这座城市被敌人围攻。

words.example: The company plans to consolidate its position in the market.
words.chineseOfExample: 该公司计划巩固其在市场上的地位。

words.example: The pupils dilate in the dark.
words.chineseOfExample: 瞳孔在黑暗中会放大。

phrases.example: I can't put up with his bad temper anymore.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 我再也忍受不了他的坏脾气了。

phrases.example: He decided to take on more responsibilities.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 他决定承担更多的责任。

phrases.example: She turned down his proposal.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 她拒绝了他的求婚。

phrases.example: We need to work out a solution to this problem.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 我们需要想出解决这个问题的办法。

phrases.example: Let's wrap up this meeting.
phrases.chineseOfExample: 咱们结束这次会议吧。
